title: Shaha98
author: Shaha98
content: How can I move up the rank on Bitcoin Forums? Just posting what we can't go up any other steps we have to take. Here I am definitely seeking the help of senior brothers, definitely help and support me.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: The first thing to do is browse the forum. Your question is discussed every other day. How did you find the "META" section? The next step is to click slowly on different sections of the forum, read the rules, and try to use the search.[Guide] Searching effectivelyAnother interesting question, why do you need a high rank?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Merit begging or asking for support won't get you there.But you know all this so this topic is once again meant to beg for Merit. I've checked all your posts and none of them is worth reading.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: Shaha98 on October 01, 2022, 06:12:15 AMHow can I move up the rank on Bitcoin Forums? Just posting what we can't go up any other steps we have to take. Quality posting it the only thing that will get you some merits unless someone gifts you a few out of pity, for example. Get involved in constructive discussions if you want your contributions to be noticed and merited. It's going to be harder for you if you don't know anything about Bitcoin and have no intention to learn how this forum works. What is it that you are interested in?

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Shaha98 on October 01, 2022, 06:12:15 AMHow can I move up the rank on Bitcoin Forums?How can you learn more about Bitcoin and benefit from the plethora of information available on this forum?This should be your question and not how to move up ranks.The primary goal of this forum is to be a hub of sharing information and engaging in constructive discussions. You can benefit from those discussions by reading more and doing your research. There's a search option on the forum, to dig into whatever information you need and you can always ask questions if you get confused on anything.Protip; the search option would also answer your initial question.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: Shaha98 on October 01, 2022, 08:35:00 AMAnd I want to grow so that I can contribute something to the forum by way of informative posts. Like your post contains a lot of information that helps younger users.You don't need a higher forum rank for that. You can already contribute to the forum and share informative posts, regardless of your rank.Remember, if your forum posts do get a lot of readers and engagement from other members, you'll have more visibility in the forum and your posts will get more attention and more merits, and you'll be promoted to higher forum rank automatically. It takes time, but it's definitely possible.

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Quote from: Shaha98 on October 01, 2022, 06:12:15 AMHow can I move up the rank on Bitcoin Forums? You should try to know the main purpose of the forum and put your focus on how to learn  bitcoin and share your knowledge that can benefit other members of the community.  Do the right things , learn bitcoin first, don't put ranks to as your first priority.  Knowledge about bitcoin will give you what you want.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: It's not hard to rank up or gain merits here, but when you first join the forum it really seems impossible. I remember when I joined I was pretty lost and probably made alot of post that made me look really stupid and desperate. Merit wasn't a thing then just had to post and get activity every couple weeks. I still felt intimidated a bit by the higher ups on the forum. I even got banned for 2 weeks for spamming while wearing a sig. Made me feel really stupid at the time. My advice, don't worry about anything but joining in conversations and offer genuine advice/help to those whom you are replying to. Don't force anything and don't be too pushy. Just participate in conversation and everything will start coming. 1 day you'll wake up and find people started reading your posts and meriting you and you weren't even expecting it. Posting is easy, just make sure you aren't spamming.

If any senior brother kindly support me then I can become junior member by getting your help or support.Just be active and contribute to what you can. Your rank does not determine on how much you can contribute in here. There were some newbies here that were far more experienced than other higher "forum ranking" users.
